maqras.text: Teuma azeub Lon azeub peudeh that Hana meusiat jeut piyoh payah
Tapeugah haba ubak awaknyan Jamee Ibrahim masa nyang sudah
‘Oh ban troh jamee tamong bak gopnyan Geumeubri saleum keu gopnyan bagah Seuot Ibrahim kamoe teumakot
Bek hai neutakot jamee dum peugah Haba gembira kamoe ba keunoe Aneuk agam droeuneuh alem leupah
Geukheun na patot gembira keu lon Watee umulon ka tuha leupah Pakrinyan takheun haba gembira
Kheun jamee teuka nyoe kon beurakah Haba sibeunar lonba bak gata Bek putoh asa gata meutuah
Kheun Ibrahim soe nyang putoh asa Mungken si buta nyang sisat leupah Han putoh asa bak rahmat Po jih Meunyoe kon ka jih sisat sileupah
Geukheun lom peue lom urusan gata Hai jamee teuka utusan Allah
Kheun jamee kamoe Neuyue jak keudeh Bak kawom paileh sisat sileupah
Laen nibak Luth ngon kawom gopnyan Bandum awaknyan ka Kamoe keubah Bandum binasa laen nibak Luth Ngon nyang ikot Luth nyang Kamoe peuglah
Teuma peureumohgeuh Kamoe kada Karoh binasa lam kawan salah
‘Oh ban troh rasul ubak Luth keunan
Geukheun di lon han lonteusoe peugah Hana lonturi bandum na gata
Kheun jamee teuka hana peue salah Kamoe nyoe teuka meuba peunyaket Nyang jikheun sulet watee tapeugah
Meuba keu gata haba nyang beunar Kamoe nyoe beunar peue nyang meupeugah
Tajak ngon kawomteuh euntreuk malam Dilikot kawom gata talangkah Bek na meusidroe nyang ngieng u likot € Tajak taturot peue kamoe peugah
Ka Kamoe wahyu keunan bak gopnyan Urusan jihnyan ka teutap sudah i Bak watee suboh bandum jih abeh Saba that paleh jipubuet salah
Awak lam keuta seunang that ate Keunan jijak le bak Luth meutuah
Kheun Luth uroenyoe bandum jameelon Bek peumalee lon tapeugot salah
Bandum na gata takwa keu Tuhan Bek peuayeb lon kawom meutuah
Jikheun kon ka lheuh kamoe tham gata Ureueng nyang teuka bek tapeusiblah
Kheun Luth jehpat dum aneuk daralon Ka izin bak lon jeut tapeurintah
Demi umuteuh bandum awaknyan Tan le pikiran ka mabok leupah ‘
Teuka geulanteue ban teubiet uroe Bandum awaknyoe teukeujet susah
Kamoe peubalek nyang ateuh uyup Umat nabi Luth ka keunong tulah Ngon batee sijjil Kamoe rhom jihnyan Lagee ujeun tron dum le sileupah
Bandum nyan tanda cit kon peue laen Keu ureueng nyang tem jitueng phaedah
Peue nyang terjadi bandum atranyan Bak jalan aman saboh daerah
Bandum nyan tanda cit kon peue laen Keu ureueng nyang tem iman keu Allah
Awak di Aikah keubit lalem that
Hana meutrep that Kamoe tueng balah Nanggroe nyan dua cit bineh jalan Rame disinan dum lalu lintah
Awak di Hijir pih keubit batat É Jikheun sulet that dum Rasul Allah
Kamoe bri keu jih dum ayat Kamoe Jikheun atranyoe hana phaedah y Jibeudoh laju jijak ho laen Muka jipaleng jibalek arah
Awaknyan teuma jikurek gunong d Keunan jitamong han jeut keu susah Jikurek gunong jipeugot rumoh Udepjih manyoh aman that leupah
Bak watee suboh teuka geulanteu Abeh jih dumpeue binasa sudah
Hana guna le bandum usaha Nyang ka jipuga ngon susah payah
Kon Kamoe peujeut langet ngon bumoe P Bandum ngon asoe teusia payah € f Meulengkan beunar cit na hikeumat Uroe kiamat teuma tan salah Han jeut han teuka uroe kiamat Teuma cit got that jih tapeumeuʻah
Keubit Po gata nyang peujeut dumpeue Neuteupue dumpeue hana meuilah
Ka lheuh Kamoe bri keu gata ayat c Tujoh boh meuhat sabe tapeugah Teuma Qur’an nyang that-that raya

Bek roe di gata harok keu salah Harok seunang that keu udep donya Meublek-blek mata taeu jih meugah Le that awak nyan taeu lam seunang Di gata hai nyan teuma bek susah Keu ureueng mukmin teuma di gata Tapeumulia droe tapeureundah
Takheun ulon nyoe ureueng peuingat Lon bri amanat nyang trang sileupah
Lagee yoh dilee awak weuk kitab Nyang ladom kitab di jih jikeubah Ka Kamoe peutron bala dum keu jih
Qur'an di jih jiweuk jipisah
Demi Po gata cit Kamoe tanyong Bandum atranyan beu ek jipeuglah
Peue nyang jipubuet bandum meutanyong
Tapeugah beutrang jinoe peurintah Peugah beutrang-trang peue geuyue gata Muchrek ceulaka bek that taindah Tapaleng muka bak awak muchrek
Kamoe poh balek soe nyang peu beueh Soe nyang keu gata jiulok-ulok
Di jih dum jicok Tuhan kon Allah Tuhan nyang laen di jih jipakoe Jiteupue dudoe teuma nyan salah
Kamoe meuteupue dadateuh picek Sabab meubalek peue nyang jipeugah
Teuma teuseubeh takheun di gata Pujoe Po gata nyang Maha Murah t Tasujud bandum pubuet ibadat
Po gata meuhat sidroe taseumah s Sampoe troh ajai taseumah Tuhan Tayakin meunan bek na meuubah
